name: Off text decoration skip ink! (Firefox / Chrome)
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Control new underline html elements on websites. For chromium 64+ and Firefox 70+. Without !important. https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/text-decoration-skip-ink
additional_info:

Syntax:

/* Single keyword */
text-decoration-skip-ink: none;
text-decoration-skip-ink: auto;
text-decoration-skip-ink: all;
